casebody.data:
Lawrence V. LONGHI, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
STARR, GERN, DAVISON & RUBIN, PC, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Allan R. Mordkoff, Esq., Defendant,
and
William B. Jones, II, Esq., et al., Defendants. C-284 September Term 2018
080776 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 30, 2018
November 2, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000645-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
